dict.string: This application makes use of the following third party libraries:

ZYQAssetPickerController ======================== [![](http://i.imgur.com/Yv6RIjd.gif?1)](http://i.imgur.com/Yv6RIjd.gif?1) ## Minimum Requirement iOS 6.0
## Installation
### via CocoaPods Install CocoaPods if you do not have it:- ```` $ [sudo] gem install cocoapods $ pod setup ```` Create Podfile:- ```` $ edit Podfile platform :ios, '5.0' pod 'ZYQAssetPickerController', '~> 1.0.0' $ pod install ```` Use the Xcode workspace instead of the project from now on.
